name: Lovely Fox
description:
Lovely Fox, a furry game about the life and times of a beautiful fox and her friends. She has great love for all the animals in the forest.
Guide Lovely fox as she decides to help others or not. Take a role in the well being of her aging grandfather, who she adores very much.
Be lovely and help others thrive!


Some Features:
Lovely female furry Fox & her Furry animal friends
Discourage bad behavior with water gun
Loot & Inventory
Pick flowers
Converse with forest friends
Open world level (work in progress)
More
